project.name: katta
project.description:
Katta: the secure and easy way to work in teams. Katta bring zero-config storage management and zero-knowledge key management for teams and organizations. It easily integrates into your existing identity management incl. OpenID Connect, SAML, and LDAP. As usual, your favorite cloud service remains your free choice.
It is also a client-side encryption software that protects your files in the cloud. It offers what is called “transparent file encryption”, i.e. it mirrors parts of a file system and allows users to read and write to it just as if it was a normal drive. When writing, it encrypts. When reading, it decrypts.
